modName: Dark Sources and where to find them
summary: Hunt for the darkest Magic sources in all of Tamriel!
descriptionHtml:
[center][/center] [color=#1e84cc][size=6] [center]  [font=Arial][b][i]Dark Sources and where to find them [/i][/b][/font][/center][/size][/color]                                                                   [size=2]          [/size][size=4]Long-term description:[/size]

[center][b][i](T[/i]his mod adds hundreds of hours of quests with very deep stories! The stories are mostly found in books by various authors and all have different stories regarding Dark Sources and they all have rewards for quest completion. The quests are puzzling and will sometimes leave you confused if you don't read properly, you might even end up in the wrong place and die! The goal of the mod is to keep the player hooked for hours maybe even days with hundreds of new quests all with deep stories and great detail.)[/b][/center]

[b][u][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][color=#ff0000][size=4][center]THIS MOD IS IN A VERY EARLY STAGE AND IS ONLY BEING RELEASED TO MAKE PEOPLE AWARE OF ITS EXISTENCE AND TO POSSIBLY HELP ME WITH STORY LINES/BUG TESTING[/center][/size][/color][/font][/u][/b]

[center][/center][center][b][i]I'[/i]m usually very active in the modding community, not always on Nexus but i'm always doing something. This mod will, well should get updated everyday with new things added so if i was you, i'd keep an eye on this or don't either way i'm still making this for my and others entertainment and to give Skyrim more quests except my quests will be more exiting and will go pretty deep.[/b][/center]


[center][b][i]A[/i]dded(17/03/17): Read the "Read me" file for information on the starter books. [this will be updated by today with new stuff]















[color=#000000][size=6]DO NOT SAVE YOUR GAME INSIDE THE BANNARDMARE/BELETHOR GOOD'S AS IT MAY CAUSE A CRASH (I'm currently still adding things, you're game if saved inside a location i'm editing will have saved a previous unedited version of that cell and will most likely crash your game)

[/size][/color]I recommend downloading this if you're here for testing and helping me finish this faster by making sure everything works, if not, yet you're still interested but disappointed- Keep an eye on the file as it will be updated very frequently!









[/b][/center]
author: NexusModdingDeamon
